welcome.title: Welcome to Amedspor Tribun
welcome.description: Stay connected with your team, share moments, and join the fan community

features.title: All in One Place
features.description: Live match scores, fan chat, news, and more

community.title: Global Tribune
community.description: Connect with fans from around the world and share your moments

privacy.title: Your Privacy Matters
privacy.description: Your data is safe. You're in full control.

consent.title: Privacy & Permissions
consent.subtitle: Please review the following permissions to continue
consent.optionalDescription: These permissions help us improve your experience
consent.termsAcceptance: I have read and accept the
consent.privacyAcceptance: I have read and accept the
consent.kvkkNotice: Under GDPR/KVKK, your personal data is protected and used only for specified purposes.

required.name: Essential Functions
required.description: Required for the app to work

error.title: Error
error.requiredConsents: You must accept the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy to continue.
error.saveFailed: Failed to save permissions. Please try again.

scope.title: 1. Service Scope
scope.content: Amedspor Tribun is a mobile platform where Amedspor fans can follow match scores, interact with the fan community, and receive news and updates.

userObligations.title: 2. User Obligations
userObligations.content:
• Provide accurate and up-to-date information
• Treat other users with respect
• Not share content that violates laws or harms the community
• Respect intellectual property rights

contentPolicy.title: 3. Content Policy
contentPolicy.content: Content shared by users (photos, comments, moments) is the responsibility of the user. The platform reserves the right to remove content that violates laws, contains hate speech, or disturbs other users.

intellectualProperty.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All designs, logos, content, and code in the application are protected by copyright. Users agree to license the usage rights of their shared content to the platform.

disclaimer.title: 5. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The platform is provided "as is". No guarantee is given that the service will be uninterrupted or error-free. Users use the application at their own risk and responsibility.

accountSuspension.title: 6. Account Suspension
accountSuspension.content: Platform management reserves the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate terms of use without prior warning.

changes.title: 7. Changes
changes.content: These terms of service may be updated from time to time. Important changes will be notified to users. Continuing to use the application after updates means you accept the new terms.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.content:
For questions:
Email: support@amedspor.com
Web: www.amedspor.com

dataController.title: 1. Data Controller
dataController.content: In accordance with applicable data protection laws (GDPR/KVKK), Amedspor Tribun application is the data controller of your personal data.

collectedData.title: 2. Collected Data
collectedData.requiredContent:
• Username and profile information
• Device information (model, operating system)
• Application usage data
collectedData.optionalContent:
• Photos and images
• Location information (for sharing)
• Communication preferences

dataUsage.title: 3. Data Usage Purposes
dataUsage.content:
Your personal data is processed for the following purposes:
• Providing application services
• Improving user experience
• Providing technical support
• Security and fraud prevention
• Statistical analysis (anonymous)

dataRetention.title: 4. Data Retention Period
dataRetention.content: Your personal data is retained for the appropriate period for the collection purpose and within legal retention requirements. When you delete your account, your data will be deleted from the system within 30 days.

dataSharing.title: 5. Data Sharing
dataSharing.content:
Your personal data is not shared with third parties except for legal obligations. Your data may be shared in the following cases:
• Legal obligations
• Ensuring user security
• Service providers (cloud, analytics)

kvkkRights.title: 6. Your Rights
kvkkRights.content:
Under data protection laws, you have the following rights:
• Learn whether your personal data is being processed
• Request information about processed data
• Request correction of data
• Request deletion of data
• Object to processing activities

security.title: 7. Security Measures
security.content:
Technical and administrative measures have been taken for the security of your personal data:
• Encrypted data transmission (SSL/TLS)
• Secure data storage
• Access control and authorization
• Regular security audits

cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: The application may use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience. On iOS devices, we will request your App Tracking Transparency (ATT) permission.

childrenPrivacy.title: 9. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our application is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect data from users under 13.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content:
To exercise your rights or for privacy-related questions:
Email: privacy@amedspor.com

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.subtitle: Choose which notifications you want to receive
notifications.manageDescription: Choose which notifications you want to receive
notifications.chatRoomsDescription: Get notified when a new chat room opens
notifications.liveMatchesDescription: Get notified when matches start and end
notifications.matchGoalsDescription: Get notified when our team scores
notifications.newsDescription: Get notified when new articles are published
notifications.announcementsDescription: Get notified when your announcement is approved
notifications.pollsDescription: Get notified when new polls are created
notifications.testScheduled: Test notification will arrive in 2 seconds
notifications.disableMessage: All notifications will be disabled. Do you want to continue?
notifications.permissionDeniedMessage: You need to grant notification permission. Please enable it in device settings.

resetOnboarding.title: Reset Onboarding
resetOnboarding.message: First-time screens and permissions will be reset. The app will restart. Do you want to continue?
resetOnboarding.restartMessage: Please close and reopen the app for changes to take effect.
